seller.title: Sellers
seller.showAllTooltip: Showing all sellers (active and inactive). Uncheck to show only active sellers.
seller.showActiveOnlyTooltip: Showing only active sellers. Check to show all sellers (active and inactive).

confirm.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this administrative cost? This will create a credit transfer.

eligibleUsers.title: Eligible Users
eligibleUsers.handoutSuccess: Successfully handed out costs to {count} users.

step1.title: Step 1: Notify Users
step1.description: Notify users who will be inactive for 2+ years

step2.title: Step 2: Handout Costs
step2.description: Handout costs to users notified last year (3+ years inactive)

notification.infoMessage: These users will be inactive for 2+ years. Notify them about upcoming administrative costs. Only users who receive a notification will be eligible for handout next year.

handout.infoMessage: These users were notified last year and are now inactive for 3+ years. You can now handout administrative costs to them. Only users who were previously notified are shown here.

confirm.notify: Do you want to notify {count} users about upcoming administrative costs?
confirm.handout: Do you want to handout administrative costs to {count} users? This will create costs for all selected users.
